text: “Sa’ad da wani yana da kumburi, ko ɓamɓaroki, ko tabo a fatar jikinsa da zai iya zama cutar fatar jiki,13.2 A al’adance kuturta; an yi amfani da ma’anar kalmar Ibraniyancin nan don cututtuka dabam-dabam da yake shafan fatar jiki, ba lalle kuturta ba; haka ma a ko’ina a cikin wannan sura. dole a kawo shi ga Haruna firist, ko kuwa ga ɗaya a cikin ’ya’yansa maza13.2 Ko kuwa zuriya wanda yake firist.
